Class InetAddressSerializer

java.lang.Object
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializer<InetAddress>
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ser.std.StdSerializer<InetAddress>
com.maxmind.geoip2.InetAddressSerializer
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonFormatVisitors.JsonFormatVisitable, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.jsonschema.SchemaAware, Serializable
public class InetAddressSerializer extends com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ser.std.StdSerializer<InetAddress>
Serializes InetAddress to its host address string representation.
